title: I can't buy champions anymore ?
body: Well  got enought influence points to buy the champions i want but the game says i dont have any . Now i can't play ranked cuz i need more champs? WTF ?  HELP?

replies.body:
This is an issue we've seen after the recent Store outage. If you launch into the Legacy Client from the Login screen, you should be able to complete your purchase with no issue.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!
